Finally, in September 2019 we're pleased to launch **finding youR way**.

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
starwars %>%
  count(species) %>%
  mutate(species = fct_reorder(species, n)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = species,
             y = n)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip()
```
